title: Make analytics page more meaningful
body:
Good quality analytics can help the protocol for users, governors and attract investment and partners.

The current analytics page offers interesting numbers such as monthly volume and fees; daily volume, total volume, total borrowed, lent and perhaps most valued by the crypto community: total value locked.

Some shortcomings have been identified though: some of the values are not being displayed correctly - particularly the daily fees, and all values are shown for the present time, not throughout time.

Having a visual representation of the evolution of these values would help the community understand the direction the platform is heading considering other initiatives, news and proposals.

I propose the development of a new, improved analytics page, strongly influenced by the current page and using the same subgraphs.

This new analytics page should feature:
* All the current features, corrected.
* Daily charts for:
  * Volume,
  * Fees, and
  * Total Value Locked (if visible in the subgraph).
* Expansion of the top traders to support different periods:
  * Last 24 hours,
  * Weekly,
  * Monthly. 

Data for this should come directly from the Marginswap subgraph.

I estimate the development should take about a week/7 days with the cost of 5133 MFI, to be paid to the address 0xC28496610E57dcc454783C61fE85421216601675 after the work is proven completed.
author: 0x6e0e75B64010da83bA46A18e4cFD7BeCC23401Ba
